caption:
This photograph captures a stunning urban sunset scene. The sky dominates the composition with gradations of orange, yellow, and deep red hues, centered around a large, glowing sun setting near the horizon. Electrical power lines stretch across the frame, prominent in the foreground against this vivid backdrop.

A towering electricity pylon on the left side of the image anchors the complex network of power lines. Silhouettes of various buildings punctuate the horizon, including high-rise structures which suggest a cityscape. The skyline also features finer details such as cranes and other urban infrastructure, contributing to a layered industrial feel.

In the background, faint outlines of mountains are visible, adding depth and contrast to the otherwise technology-oriented skyline. The overall mood of the scene is one of powerful tranquility, combining elements of nature and human-made structures in a harmonious display.
title: Valley National Bank's 35-storey building near Sky Harbor Airport
